slimming.t1:
During most of my professional life, I’ve tried to look for efficient alternatives which could act as substitutes to official medical procedures (while not acting against them!) and measured them up to the following parameters:
  • Efficiency
  • Safety
  • Practicality
  • Harmlessness for health
slimming.t2:
One of the most important areas I have looked into were patients affected with obesity. I was trying to find an easy, comprehensible and reliable method that would help patients lose weight once and for all. By easy to use, I meant a program that is easy to abide by in daily life, so no counting calories or overly complicated to cook low-calorie meals. Something that anyone could follow. By reliability, I meant a program that – if one abides by its rules – would bring results to practically any patient without exception. By comprehensible, I meant a method that would introduce a system leading to success without fail. I wanted the method I pictured to be understood by anyone without needing medical education or having to read extensive literature on the topic. After trying several methods in vain, I found the right track thanks to the concept of protein diets, which I have gradually adapted to east and central European eating habits while optimizing to make it easier to follow.

I requested help from doctors and nutritionists with whom we tested the practical impact of our experimental theories and negative experience with other dieting methods.

We created a program based on our observations and named it the DANNY CHANDLER’S AMAZING SWISS SLIMMING CONCEPT, which covers everything that we expected of it. It’s systematically effective, absolutely safe when indicated correctly, and extremely practical (it’s based on instant meals, so there is no need for sophisticated cooking) and absolutely harmless for your health, meaning no chemicals (its main ingredients are proteins based on milk, soy, peas etc.).

The result is a program that not only gives the client means to fight their extra weight, but gives them a way to win it once and for all.

partnership.t1:
My collaborators and I have decided to make DANNY CHANDLER’S AMAZING SWISS SLIMMING CONCEPT available to all serious interested parties, who’d like to promote a time-proven weight-loss method that we adapted to a different „target audience“, with entirely different eating habits and consumer reflexes than those from the USA (where the protein diet was created), and France (the European country in which the protein diet developer the most). Our partner will gain precious know-how, which will help them avoid a number of mistakes that we made while trying to find the perfect formula.

It’s not a franchise, despite how it may look like at first sight. Our goal isn’t to make tens or hundreds of small centers that we can’t even care for properly at the end of the day. Our goal is to propose our project to an ambitious partner who’d like full exclusivity in his country, one that would be able to develop it in grand style. Our partners do not pay us any registration fee, we do not force them to make contractually determined sales, we do not set business goals to them.

Why? Because the effectiveness of our weight-loss program is so shocking that we don’t need those.

We offer our partners consultations, conferences and organizational support and when their business develops we start participating reasonably while searching for other ways to expand this uncommon weight-loss method.

Should you consider working with us, do not hesitate to contact us and we’ll gladly discuss the details of a possible collaboration.
partnership.t2:
People and parties interested in doing business in the area of weight-loss have to face a lot of unknown…
  • Choosing the right method

First and foremost, one has to choose a suitable and effective method from the incredible amount of methods that are out there.

  • Choosing the right products

If one decides that the protein diet is the most considerate, reliable and healthy way to lose weight, then he must start with a set of protein products, usually united under a brand name thus becoming a brand dealer… or he finds a manufacturer and creates his own brand… But which manufacturer? But how to decide which one? And how does one know if it’s a legitimate one and their products are going to work? And if it theoretically works, how does one continue to promote the products when any activity from the manufacturer is over once he produces and sells you their products…. How to present the products? To whom, what target audience? And what to do should any problems arise? Patients are losing weight… report medical problems during the diet… where is the mistake? I have products in my warehouse that nobody wants, what do I do with them?

Choosing the right product is simply not enough to reach your goal.

  • Lectures and medical supervision
  • A know-how of 20 years and a serious background provided by its Swiss maternal company…
  • Many other things distinguish us from similar vendors of „guaranteed“ methods and „miraculous“ weight-loss cases.
